posts.body:
ðŸ¤– Experimenting with GPT-4 API for code generation

Surprisingly good at:
- React components (85% usable)
- Unit tests (needs some tweaking)
- Documentation (excellent!)

Not so good at:
- Complex business logic
- Database optimizations

Verdict: Great assistant, not a replacement... yet.

#AI #GPT #Programming

posts.body:
Fixed a memory leak bug in Node.js microservice

Problem: setInterval without clearInterval in RabbitMQ message handler

Solution: Added graceful shutdown and Prometheus monitoring

Result: Memory stable for 48+ hours ðŸŽ‰

ðŸŽ¯ Completed a React marathon! 30 days, 30 components.

Key insights:

2) Optimization with useMemo/useCallback is crucial
